LanguageData.SimpleMechaTechnologies.label: Simple mecha-techs

LanguageData.MechaHelmets.label: Mecha-helmets
LanguageData.MechaHelmets.description: Allows to craft tactical and "Puma" helmets.
LanguageData.SynthreadAndHyperweave.label: Synthread/Hyperweave
LanguageData.SynthreadAndHyperweave.description: Allows to make synthread and hyperweave from multicloth and other materials.
LanguageData.SimpleMechaWeapon.label: Simple mecha-weapon
LanguageData.SimpleMechaWeapon.description: Unlocks craft of simple Mechalit weapons.
LanguageData.ArmorMechalit.label: Mechalit armor
LanguageData.ArmorMechalit.description: Research allows to create parts of Mechalit armor set: helmet and body armor.
LanguageData.ThermoclothandMechacloth.label: Thermothread/Mechaweave
LanguageData.ThermoclothandMechacloth.description: Research unlocks elite types of textile.
LanguageData.AdvancedMechaWeapon.label: Advanced mecha-weapon

LanguageData.EliteMechaWeapons.label: Elite mecha-weapon
LanguageData.EliteMechaWeapons.description: Unlocks craft of elite Mechalit weapons.
